item.title: Day1
item.description: Numpy NumPy is a package in Python used for Scientific Computing. NumPy package is used to perform different operations. The ndarray (NumPy Array) is a multidimensional array used to store values of same datatype. These arrays are indexed just like Sequences, starts with zero. Here some of the important numpy array functions and properties. Importing and Exporting Options(Np. will be used to call the function) np.loadtxt(‘filename.txt’) -> To load text file the path will be given in the parameter
